S.FORM: nsgan Ru-yey(kari sbnawan: Shikano, kari klmukan: Lo̍k-iá-hiong, kari Ngay-ngay hnang 4 nyusan Tay-wang : Luk Iaˊ Hiongˊ. Kari Ngay-ngay mslxan: Lu̍k-yâ-hiông)ga mniq tgska nyusan Tay-tung Tay-wang, quri baraw o msgasig nsgan Kwan-san, mgbaraw ryaxan hidaw o msgasig nsgan Haytwan, quri nklaan hidaw o msgasig nsgan Tung-hu, quri ryaxan hidaw ni hunat o plutut nsgan Yeyn-ping. Pnteayus qmpahan euda qmpah Sayang nsgan Ru-yey o niqan 8000 hmbragan hiyi, seejiq klmukan 40％, seejiq ngayngay 30％, seejiq tnpusu mkbrnux o 20％, Duma do 10％. Lala klgan seejiq ni niqan nanak knkla kndsan dha. Nsgan Ru-yey spuan na kmlawa ka alang o saw nii, Ru-yey, Lung-teyn, Yung-an, Jwey-rung,Jwey-yeyn,Jwey-hu, Jwey-hung, niqan empitu alang, qmpah quri dxgal o tg10 o niqan 7. Qmpah dxgal ka pusu qpahun dha. alang Lung-teyn, Jwey-hung, Yung-an, Jwey-hu, Jwey-lung, Ru-yey, Jwey-yeyn. Endaan Ru-yey o knxalan Cying siida klwaan nsgan Kwang-san. klwaan Ni-hung siida do wada pryuxan nsgan Kwan-san alang Ru-yey ksun. bukuy mnkeekan do pryuxun ni phyugun "nsgan Ru-yey". Kiya ni balay ni nLey-kung-hu ka Sang-yey, Cung-yey, Syia-yey do wada spuun alang Rwan-san syusi ni msupu nsgan Yeyn-ping. Niqan dha ka pnyahan kari Hangan dxgal Ru-yey, kingal o msa, dxgal hini sbiyaw o taadus bbuyu, msuwil niqan qpuring rqnux miyah rmdu msangay hini. Kika ksun"Ru-yey". Kingal kari duri o, klwaan Ni-hung siida, seejiq Ni-hung o phiyug kingal alang hini yahun dha mniq seejiq tmbarah, kika psli seejiq nyusan Sin-sey dmqpah dxgal miyah tbarah hini, kika seejiq Ni-hung do hangan dxgal ruliaw siida o pryuxun Ru-yey ksun. bukuy mnkeekan do phiyug nsgan siida do asi angal hangan nsgan. Paah alang paru Tay-tung muda elug Tay-wang 9 spgan mquri tgbaraw, muda dgril Cu-ru ayug rklu, muda duri ayug Ru-yey, qtaan o saw kingal paru bi tadus breenux. Hini o Ching siida bukung Tay-tung Hu-cwan o saw kari na"tgparu bi tadus breenux Tay-tung"msa. knxalan sayang do hini o kika ksun pusu phpah qlupas -"Ru-yey"ksun, Ru-yey o mnda yahan ttmalang qpuring rqnux. Qrunang mangal tunux seejiq mkdiyaq. Seejiq Ni-hung o lnlungan dha hini o malu balay nniqan. Duri ni seejiq pnaah ryahan hidaw Tay-wang o kuxul dha balay miyah tg2 tbarah mniq. Sayang do seejiq qnpah qpahun klwaan ni mtgsa o kuxul dha balay gmaaw miyah tpusu mniq. Duri ni kska klwaan Tay-wang o paru balay nsgan yahan rmigaw qmita ni msangay. Hmbragan seejiq 2021/2 7,579 Elug hqulan Ru-yey o ga mniq breenux gbiyuk Hwa-Tung pusu elug o niqan elug qrngul Tay-tung ni elug Tay-wang tg9 spgan o muda tglihug ska hini. Elug tdruy qrngul Sapah kmlawa tdruy qrngul Tay-wang(• Elug Tay-tung:rdaan Jwey-hu -rdaan Jwey-yeyn -rdaan Ru-yey) Tdruy bahu,tdruy ppaan seejiq • Ting-tung tdruy ppaan seejiq Ｔtgsa ptasan tgska • ptasan tgska Ru-yey nyusan Tay-tung(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) • ptasan tgska Jwi-yeyn nyusan Tay-tung(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) ptasan tgbilaq • Ptasan tgbilaq Ru-yey nsgan Ru-yey • Ptasan tgbilaq Yung-an nsgan Ru-yey(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Yung-an ptasan sbiq Yung-rung nsgan Ru-yey nyusan Tay-tung(wada laxan) • Ptasan tgbilaq Jweyyen nsgan Ru-yey(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Jwey-hung nsgan Ru-yey(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Lung-ten nsgan Ru-yey(patas spgan ga skuun psraman mangal,ga skuun sapah pnatas elug samaw kaji) Ｓaan rmigaw qmita • Elug knhuway tqiri nsgan Ruyey qtaan mneudus • Elug bling mpajiq Wu-ring • Dxgal qcilus Sin-liang • 2 tntunan hakaw Ping-suey • Tgbaraw tatat Ryey Prajing 2011 hnkawas qulung rbagan do nsgan Ru-yey muda euda "Tay-wang kklwaan skiya mtalux paru qurug gowmu cya-neyn-hwa." Ｋnmalu nhuma • qsiya rbnaw Hu-rung • Embanah Wulung qsiya rbnaw • sibus embanah • Karat • Howlung kow • Gitu • Blbul • bkiluh • Karat bkiluh ((Snakun:Truku))

nsgan Ro-yey(kari sbnawan: Shikano, kari klmokan: Lo̍k-iá-hiong, kari Ngay-ngay hnang 4 nyosan Tay-wang : Lok Iaˊ Hiongˊ. Kari Ngay-ngay mslxan: Lo̍k-yâ-hiông)ga mniq tgska nyosan Tay-tong Tay-wang, qori baraw o msgasig nsgan Kwan-san, mgbaraw ryaxan hidaw o msgasig nsgan Haytwan, qori nklaan hidaw o msgasig nsgan Tong-ho, qori ryaxan hidaw ni honat o plotot nsgan Yeyn-ping. Pnteayos qmpahan eoda qmpah Sayang nsgan Ro-yey o niqan 8000 hmbragan hiyi, seejiq klmokan 40％, seejiq ngayngay 30％, seejiq tnposo mkbrnox o 20％, Doma do 10％. Lala klgan seejiq ni niqan nanak knkla kndsan dha. Nsgan Ro-yey spoan na kmlawa ka alang o saw nii, Ro-yey, Long-teyn, Yong-an, Jwey-rong,Jwey-yeyn,Jwey-ho, Jwey-hong, niqan empito alang, qmpah qori dxgal o tg10 o niqan 7. Qmpah dxgal ka poso qpahon dha. alang Long-teyn, Jwey-hong, Yong-an, Jwey-ho, Jwey-long, Ro-yey, Jwey-yeyn. Endaan Ro-yey o knxalan Cying siida klwaan nsgan Kwang-san. klwaan Ni-hong siida do wada pryoxan nsgan Kwan-san alang Ro-yey kson. bokoy mnkeekan do pryoxon ni phyogon "nsgan Ro-yey". Kiya ni balay ni nLey-kong-ho ka Sang-yey, Cong-yey, Syia-yey do wada spoon alang Rwan-san syosi ni msopo nsgan Yeyn-ping. Niqan dha ka pnyahan kari Hangan dxgal Ro-yey, kingal o msa, dxgal hini sbiyaw o taados bboyo, msowil niqan qporing rqnox miyah rmdo msangay hini. Kika kson"Ro-yey". Kingal kari dori o, klwaan Ni-hong siida, seejiq Ni-hong o phiyog kingal alang hini yahon dha mniq seejiq tmbarah, kika psli seejiq nyosan Sin-sey dmqpah dxgal miyah tbarah hini, kika seejiq Ni-hong do hangan dxgal roliaw siida o pryoxon Ro-yey kson. bokoy mnkeekan do phiyog nsgan siida do asi angal hangan nsgan. Paah alang paro Tay-tong moda elog Tay-wang 9 spgan mqori tgbaraw, moda dgril Co-ro ayog rklo, moda dori ayog Ro-yey, qtaan o saw kingal paro bi tados breenox. Hini o Ching siida bokong Tay-tong Ho-cwan o saw kari na"tgparo bi tados breenox Tay-tong"msa. knxalan sayang do hini o kika kson poso phpah qlopas -"Ro-yey"kson, Ro-yey o mnda yahan ttmalang qporing rqnox. Qronang mangal tonox seejiq mkdiyaq. Seejiq Ni-hong o lnlongan dha hini o malo balay nniqan. Dori ni seejiq pnaah ryahan hidaw Tay-wang o koxol dha balay miyah tg2 tbarah mniq. Sayang do seejiq qnpah qpahon klwaan ni mtgsa o koxol dha balay gmaaw miyah tposo mniq. Dori ni kska klwaan Tay-wang o paro balay nsgan yahan rmigaw qmita ni msangay. Hmbragan seejiq 2021/2 7,579 Elog hqolan Ro-yey o ga mniq breenox gbiyok Hwa-Tong poso elog o niqan elog qrngol Tay-tong ni elog Tay-wang tg9 spgan o moda tglihog ska hini. Elog tdroy qrngol Sapah kmlawa tdroy qrngol Tay-wang(• Elog Tay-tong:rdaan Jwey-ho -rdaan Jwey-yeyn -rdaan Ro-yey) Tdroy baho,tdroy ppaan seejiq • Ting-tong tdroy ppaan seejiq Ｔtgsa ptasan tgska • ptasan tgska Ro-yey nyosan Tay-tong(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) • ptasan tgska Jwi-yeyn nyosan Tay-tong(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) ptasan tgbilaq • Ptasan tgbilaq Ro-yey nsgan Ro-yey • Ptasan tgbilaq Yong-an nsgan Ro-yey(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Yong-an ptasan sbiq Yong-rong nsgan Ro-yey nyosan Tay-tong(wada laxan) • Ptasan tgbilaq Jweyyen nsgan Ro-yey(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Jwey-hong nsgan Ro-yey(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) • Ptasan tgbilaq Long-ten nsgan Ro-yey(patas spgan ga skoon psraman mangal,ga skoon sapah pnatas elog samaw kaji) Ｓaan rmigaw qmita • Elog knhoway tqiri nsgan Royey qtaan mneodos • Elog bling mpajiq Wo-ring • Dxgal qcilos Sin-liang • 2 tntonan hakaw Ping-soey • Tgbaraw tatat Ryey Prajing 2011 hnkawas qolong rbagan do nsgan Ro-yey moda eoda "Tay-wang kklwaan skiya mtalox paro qorog gowmo cya-neyn-hwa." Ｋnmalo nhoma • qsiya rbnaw Ho-rong • Embanah Wolong qsiya rbnaw • sibos embanah • Karat • Howlong kow • Gito • Blbol • bkiloh • Karat bkiloh ((Snakon:Troko))
